TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ProjectCachePluginBase extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Only one plugin instance can exist for a given BuildManager BeginBuild / EndBuild session. Any exceptions thrown by the plugin will cause MSBuild to fail the build.

Docs.summary: Called once before the build, to have the plugin instantiate its state. Errors are checked via .

Docs.summary: Called once after all the build to let the plugin do any post build operations (log metrics, cleanup, etc). Errors are checked via .

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Microsoft.Build.Experimental.ProjectCache.CacheResult> GetCacheResultAsync (Microsoft.Build.Execution.BuildRequestData buildRequest, Microsoft.Build.Experimental.ProjectCache.PluginLoggerBase logger, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class Microsoft.Build.Experimental.ProjectCache.CacheResult> GetCacheResultAsync(class Microsoft.Build.Execution.BuildRequestData buildRequest, class Microsoft.Build.Experimental.ProjectCache.PluginLoggerBase logger, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetCacheResultAsync (buildRequest As BuildRequestData, logger As PluginLoggerBase, cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task(Of CacheResult)

Docs.summary: Called once for each build request. Operation needs to be atomic. Any side effects (IO, environment variables, etc) need to be reverted upon cancellation. MSBuild may choose to cancel this method and build the project itself. Errors are checked via .
